name: Wakey Wakey, Time for School!
description:
A short mini game where it simulates a typical day of a life of a f2f student at CIIT

A game submitted to Cod1fy 2022 Technology Challenge

Developed by:

Dyep (Geoff Mendoza)

Pyo (Fiona Brozas)

Controls

Side Scroll: A/D to move

Mouse to interact

Top Down: W/S to move
